data.text: @AlecFPrice Really thought about putting Haywire in there, because I both love the film and enjoy Douglas' performance but it just seemed pushing it too far, as he isn't in it quite enough. So it ended on the list cutting room floor with Fatal Attraction and The China Syndrome, among others.

@AlecFPrice Yes, that's the one I tried to fit in. It was originally in because I was going to leave out Behind the Candelabra, because it was a 'TV movie'; but it made the cut at the last moment. Douglas' work with Soderbergh is a fun small aspect of their careers.
@JetToneFan Actually, there must be a way to get Fatal Attraction in there as that feels like Douglas canon.
@JetToneFan Damn. I find that list impossible to find any fault with whatsoever.
